T02D3173:190a-1: aa ra pa tsa s'a dha nam /
T02D3173:190a-3: spros pa med pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3173:190a-4: dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang rjes su
T02D3173:190a-5: mthun pa'i sa phyogs su bde ba'i stan la nye
T02D3173:190a-6: bar gnas te / rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig
T02D3173:190a-7: dang po las kun nas byung ba'i zla ba la
T02D3173:190a-8: bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni sa bon te dh'i: aa:
T02D3173:190a-9: dang tsheg drag gnyis kyang mthar sbyar ba rnam par
T02D3173:190a-10: bar gnas te / bsgom par bya'o // de nas
T02D3173:190a-11: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams nyon mongs pa'i mun
T02D3173:190a-12: nag dang ldan pa'i snying rje dang dga' ba dang
T02D3173:190a-13: btang snyoms zhes bya ba'i tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po
T02D3173:190a-14: rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bsgom par bya
T02D3173:190a-15: bar gnas te / bsgom par bya'o // ba'o // byams pa gang zhe na /
T02D3173:190a-16: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa nyid du byams pa'o //
T02D3173:190a-18: sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal bar gyur
T02D3173:190a-19: pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol
T02D3173:190a-22: bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzhan gyi longs
T02D3173:190a-23: spyod dang dbang phyug la sogs par sems dga' ba
T02D3173:190a-24: nyid do // btang snyoms gang zhe na /
T02D3173:190a-25: thams cad la khong khro ba dang rjes su chags pa dang bral bas /
T02D3173:190a-26: gzhan la phan pa'i chos nyid la dang gis zhugs
T02D3173:190a-27: par gyur pas legs par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o
T02D3173:190a-28: // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la
T02D3173:190a-29: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer nyid las kun
T02D3173:190a-30: nas byon pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D3173:190a-31: chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyogs mtha' dag khyab pa
T02D3173:190a-32: // rnams kyis / spro ba dang bsdu ba'i tshul
T02D3173:190a-33: gyis 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba mdzad pa la
T02D3173:190a-34: gcig tu gzhol bar gyur par bltas la /
T02D3173:190a-35: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer nyid
T02D3173:190a-36: las lha rdzas kyi dri dang me tog gi bye
T02D3173:190b-0: brag la sogs pa rnams nges par @190b spros te
T02D3173:190b-1: / mandala gyi bya ba mngon du btud pa'i thal
T02D3173:190b-2: mo sbyar bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3173:190b-3: rnams kyi zhabs pad la spyi bo legs par gtugs
T02D3173:190b-4: pa'i yan lag lngas phyag btsal bar bya ba'o //
T02D3173:190b-5: 'od zer de dag nyid las ngas par byung ba'i
T02D3173:190b-6: me tog dang bdug spos dang mar me dang phye
T02D3173:190b-7: ma dang dri dang na bza' dang rgyal mtshan dang
T02D3173:190b-8: dril bu dang ba dan la sogs pa'i phyi dang
T02D3173:190b-9: nang gi mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis legs
T02D3173:190b-10: par mchod par bya bas mchod par bya ba'o //
T02D3173:190b-11: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya ste /
T02D3173:190b-12: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis ni //
T02D3173:190b-13: lus dang ngag dang nge bzhin yid kyis kyang //
T02D3173:190b-14: sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa //
T02D3173:190b-15: de dag thams cad rgyal rnams spyan sngar bshags //
T02D3173:190b-16: zhes bya ba ni sdig pa bshags pa'o //
T02D3173:190b-17: de bzhin gshags pa rnams gang yin pa dang gzhan
T02D3173:190b-18: dag kyang rdzogs pa'i byang chub la kun nas legs
T02D3173:190b-19: par brten pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dang dam
T02D3173:190b-20: pa'i skye bo rnams kyi yang rung ste /
T02D3173:190b-21: bsod nams de dag rnams thams cad la bdag rjes
T02D3173:190b-22: su yi rang bar bgyid do zhes bya ba ni
T02D3173:190b-23: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D3173:190b-24: thugs rje'i yon tan tshogs kyis mtha' yas phyogs rnams khyab //
T02D3173:190b-25: dus gsum kun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus dang //
T02D3173:190b-26: mchog tu skyon bral 'phags pa'i tshogs dang ma chos la //
T02D3173:190b-27: mi phyed dad pas bdag ni legs par skyabs su mchi //
T02D3173:190b-28: zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o //
T02D3173:190b-29: tshangs dbang dang ni drag sogs las yang ches dkon pa'o//
T02D3173:190b-30: yongs dag rgyal pa rnams kyi lam la gnas par bgyi //
T02D3173:190b-31: bdag la 'dir byung ba yi bsod nams tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D3173:190b-32: byang chub sems rab bdag gis 'dir ni bskyed par bgyi //
T02D3173:190b-33: zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba'i lam la gnas pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gnyis so //
T02D3173:190b-34: de ltar bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun byas pa'i gting la /
T02D3173:190b-35: bla ma'i gsung gis phyi dang nang du byams pa stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom mo //
T02D3173:190b-36: de nas de brtan par bya ba'i don du /
T02D3173:190b-37: aom rang bzhin gyis rnam dag pas chos kun rang
T02D3173:191a-0: bzhin rnam dag bdag / ces bya ba'i tshigs @191a
T02D3173:191a-1: * // su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis snyan par bya ba'o //
T02D3173:191a-2: de'i rjes la rang gi sems kyi snang btsam 'ba'
T02D3173:191a-3: zhig pa dang zhing thogs pa med pa'i ngo bor
T02D3173:191a-4: gyur pa'i dbyangs yig dang po las byung pa'i zla
T02D3173:191a-5: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par rang gi sems rnam
T02D3173:191a-7: de'i steng du ni snga bshad pa'i sa bon no //
T02D3173:191a-8: sa bon dang zla ba de dag yongs su gyur nas 'od 'phro ba'i rang bzhin gyi ral gri'o //
T02D3173:191a-9: de nas sngar brjod pa'i sa bon zla ba'i steng na gnas pa chang zungs kyi dkyil du'o //
T02D3173:191a-10: ral gri dang sa bon de dag yongs su gyur pa las 'jam pa'i dbyangs te /
T02D3173:191a-11: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa phyogs bcu'i
T02D3173:191a-12: 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od dang ldan pa
T02D3173:191a-13: phyag gnyis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can /
T02D3173:191a-14: phyag g-yas na rmongs pa ma lus par rtsad nas
T02D3173:191a-15: gcod par mdzad pa la gcig tu gzhol ba'i shes
T02D3173:191a-16: rab kyi ral gri bsnams ba'o //
T02D3173:191a-17: phyag g-yon pa na thabs su gyur pa'i rig pa'i
T02D3173:191a-18: bstan bcos mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i po ti
T02D3173:191a-19: cig bsnams pa'o // rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan
T02D3173:191a-20: cing na bza' dmar po bsnams pa bsam gtan gyis
T02D3173:191a-21: gcig tu nges par zhal padma dang 'dra bar rgyas
T02D3173:191a-22: shing spyan padma dmar po dang mtshungs par skyes bu
T02D3173:191a-23: chen po'i mtshan rnams rdzogs pa la nor bu aindra
T02D3173:191a-24: n'i la'i kha dog mtshungs pa'i zur phud lnga 'khyil
T02D3173:191a-25: cig bsnams pa'o // pa / padma dkar po 'dab
T02D3173:191a-26: ma brgyad pa dang zla ba dag la rdo rje
T02D3173:191a-27: skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa ste /
T02D3173:191a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D3173:191a-29: kyi ngo bor gyur pa'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi skur
T02D3173:191a-30: bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D3173:191a-31: / de ltar dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang
T02D3173:191a-32: ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar yi
T02D3173:191a-33: ge aa nges par rdzogs pa las /
T02D3173:191a-34: dang po'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa spro ba dang
T02D3173:191a-35: bsdu ba'i 'od kyi tshogs kyis rmongs ba ma lus
T02D3173:191a-36: pa nges par 'jig par byed cing g-yas phyogs su
T02D3173:191a-37: 'khor ba'i rim gyis myur du 'khor bar blta bar
T02D3173:191a-38: bya ba'o // de'i steng du nam mkha' la dbyangs
T02D3173:191a-39: yig dang po las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3173:191a-40: bya ba'o // ro // de'i steng du yi ge
T02D3173:191a-41: lnga rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du lte bar
T02D3173:191a-42: gyur pas me dang mtshungs pa 'od zer dang bcas
T02D3173:191a-43: pa rmongs pa mtha' dag dpyis 'byin par byed pa
T02D3173:191b-0: bla ma'i gdams @191b ngag las khyad par du bsgom
T02D3173:191b-1: bya ba'o // ro // par bya ba'o // lha'i
T02D3173:191b-2: skur bskyed la skyo ba mang ba'i sngags pas spro
T02D3173:191b-3: ba la sogs pa blta bar byas la bzlas pa
T02D3173:191b-4: bya ba'o // ro // par bya ba'o // bya
T02D3173:191b-5: ba'o // yang na snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus su
T02D3173:191b-6: shin tu dang ba'i yi ge aa las grub pa'i
T02D3173:191b-7: aa ra pa tsa na zhes bya bar grags pa'i
T02D3173:191b-8: dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsam gtan
T02D3173:191b-9: la gcig tu nges par dgyes pa rdo rje'i skyil
T02D3173:191b-10: mo krung gis legs par bzhugs pa ste /
T02D3173:191b-11: phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis ral gri dang glegs bam bsnams pa /
T02D3173:191b-12: mtha' dag kyang aindra n'i la 'khyil ba'i zur phud
T02D3173:191b-13: lnga dang ldan pa bzhin zla ba rgyas pa dang
T02D3173:191b-14: mtshungs pa / gsung gi mchog mnga' ba /
T02D3173:191b-15: rang gi sa bon zla ba la gnas pa snying gar rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3173:191b-16: de'i mdun du yi ge ra dkar po las nges
T02D3173:191b-17: par byung ba'i dra ba'i 'od de rang gi snying
T02D3173:191b-18: ga'i zla ba la rang gis byin gyis brlabs par
T02D3173:191b-20: de'i rjes la rgyab tu yi ge pa dkar po rdzogs pa las zla ba'i 'od de /
T02D3173:191b-21: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sa bon dang ldan par legs par blta bar bya ba'o //
T02D3173:191b-22: de nas g-yas su gang ba'i yi ge tsa rdzogs
T02D3173:191b-23: pa las dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
T02D3173:191b-24: nu ma gnyis rgyas pa'i skra can ma ste /
T02D3173:191b-25: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sa bon dang ldan par rnam par bsam mo //
T02D3173:191b-26: de bzhin du yi ge na dkar po las grub pa'i nye ba'i skra tsa nam yang /
T02D3173:191b-27: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sa bon dang kun nas ldan par rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3173:191b-28: thams cad kyang aa ra pa tsa na dang cha 'dra bar rnam par bsam mo //
T02D3173:191b-29: 'dir lha'i tshogs rnams kyi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D3173:191b-30: 'od kyis dga' ba dang spro ba dang bsdu bas
T02D3173:191b-31: skye dgu rnams kyi rmongs pa'i phung po rtsa ba
T02D3173:191b-32: nas gcod cing / bzo dang rig pa'i gnas kyi
T02D3173:191b-33: bstan bcos su gyur pa mtha' dag gi chos kyi
T02D3173:191b-34: bdud rtsis sems can thams cad tshim par yud tsam
T02D3173:191b-35: la bdag nyid gtsang la thog sdug dang bral ba'i
T02D3173:191b-36: lus kyis bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D3173:191b-37: bla ma'i gdams ngag las mnyam par gzhag pa'i sngags pas bzlas pa yang bya ste /
T02D3173:191b-39: sa bon gyi yi ge lnga ni bar du'o //
T02D3173:191b-40: dam tshig sems dpa' sa bon mthar byas pa ni sngags so //
T02D3173:191b-41: gang gi tshe langs par 'dod pa'i bsam pa byung
T02D3173:192a-0: ba'i tshe rang gi sngags bla ma'i gdams @192a *
T02D3173:192a-2: yi ge brgya pa'i tshigs bcad brjod par bya ste /
T02D3173:192a-3: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02D3173:192a-5: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D3173:192a-7: su to shr+ya me bha pa /
T02D3173:192a-8: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3173:192a-9: su po shr+yo me bha ba /
T02D3173:192a-12: tsi ttam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na /
T02D3173:192a-13: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra ma me mu nytsa /
T02D3173:192a-14: badzri bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa:
T02D3173:192a-15: zhes bya ba'i sngags yi ge brgya pa bton pa'i
T02D3173:192a-16: rjes la / spro ba la sogs pa yang btang
T02D3173:192a-17: la dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D3173:192a-18: spyod lam thams cad kyis gnas par bya ste /
T02D3173:192a-19: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni yang dag
T02D3173:192a-20: pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D3173:192a-21: par gyur nas dus ring por mi thogs pa nyid
T02D3173:192a-22: na bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur
T02D3173:192a-23: ba yin no // grol ba'i tshig gis gsal ba 'dir //
T02D3173:192a-24: sgrub thabs snang ba legs bris la //
T02D3173:192a-25: gang byung pad 'byung bsod nams rgyun //
T02D3173:192a-26: des ni srid pa las grol shog / tshig lhug pa'i aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs so //
